title: OGH - Installing Off Grid Submersible Solar Water Pump for our Developed Spring

tasks.task: Fixing a water pump at the lower cistern
subtasks: Using a SureFlow diaphragm pump for pressure siphoning
Installing a new Aquamarine-made 24V DC submersible pump
Drilling holes in the cistern for pumping lines
Installing a float valve to prevent pump burnout
Connecting electrical wires to the pump and float switch
Insulating holes with silicone to prevent critter entry
Ensuring proper orientation of float switch for safety

tasks.task: Setting up a solar panel system for pump power
subtasks: Installing a 10-gauge amplifier wire 100 feet long
Wiring solar panels in parallel for 12V with high amperage
Considering series connection for 24V in future

tasks.task: Maintaining the spring and overflow system
subtasks: Checking for and addressing leakage issues
Removing and preventing roly-poly insects
Shielding the system from sunlight to prevent algae growth
